```{r}
Turtle <- read.csv("Turtle.csv", sep= ";", header = TRUE )
Turtle
```


```{r}
shapiro.test(Turtle$length)
shapiro.test(Turtle$width)
shapiro.test(Turtle$height)
shapiro.test(Turtle$weight)
```
```{r}
cor(Turtle)
```
```{r}
lm.p<-lm(Turtle$weight~., data = Turtle)
summary(lm.p)
```

```{r}
plot(lm.p)
```
